Sql.CDATA: -- OpenTR Source Data IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_OpenTRSourceData' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_OpenTRSourceData] GO CREATE VIEW v_OpenTRSourceData AS WITH TRSourceData as( SELECT Company.CompanyCD AS Company, InventoryItem.InventoryCD AS Sku, INSite.SiteCD Warehouse, CASE WHEN CAST(DateAdd(day, CAST(ISNULL(INSiteKvExt.ValueString,90) as int) , SOLine.RequestDate) AS Date) < CAST(GetDate() AS Date) THEN CAST(GetDate() AS Date) ELSE CAST(DateAdd(day, CAST(ISNULL(INSiteKvExt.ValueString,90) as int) , SOLine.RequestDate) AS Date) END AS ETA, SOLine.OpenQty FROM SOOrder SOOrder LEFT JOIN Company Company ON SOOrder.CompanyID = Company.CompanyID LEFT JOIN SOLine SOLine ON SOOrder.CompanyID = SOLine.CompanyID AND SOOrder.OrderNbr = SOLine.OrderNbr AND SOOrder.OrderType = SOLine.OrderType AND SOLine.CompanyID > 0 LEFT JOIN INSite INSite ON SOOrder.CompanyID = INSite.CompanyID AND SOOrder.DestinationSiteID = INSite.SiteID AND INSite.CompanyID > 0 LEFT JOIN InventoryItem InventoryItem ON SOLine.CompanyID = InventoryItem.CompanyID AND SOLine.InventoryID = InventoryItem.InventoryID AND InventoryItem.CompanyID > 0 LEFT JOIN INSiteKvExt ON INSite.CompanyID = INSiteKvExt.CompanyID AND INsite.NoteID = INSiteKvExt.RecordID AND INSiteKvExt.FieldName = 'AttributeWHLEADTIME' AND INSiteKvExt.CompanyID > 0 WHERE SOOrder.OrderType = 'TR' AND SOline.OpenQty > 0 AND SOOrder.Status != 'L' AND SOOrder.CompanyID > 0) SELECT Company,Sku,Warehouse,CAST(ETA AS datetime) AS ETA ,SUM(OpenQty) AS OpenQty FROM TRSourceData GROUP BY Company,Sku,Warehouse,ETA
